short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart Chrome extension, send text to OpenAI GPTs with one click, customize quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Google Chrome extension is designed to facilitate smoother interactions with OpenAI's GPT. It allows users to customize commands to automatically send text from web pages to GPT or to create a set of quick-access options for intelligent feedback from GPT. Whether for language model training, writing assistance, or simple interactive entertainment, this plugin enhances your user experience.
